programme.title: The Bucket List
Das Beste kommt zum Schluss
programme.desc:
The Bucket List: Directed by Rob Reiner. With Jack Nicholson, Morgan Freeman, Sean Hayes, Beverly Todd. Two terminally ill men escape from a cancer ward and head off on a road trip with a wish list of to-dos before they die." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0825232/","name":"The Bucket List","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY2NTUyMjIyNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwNzYwMDM4._V1_.jpg","description":"Two terminally ill men escape from a cancer ward and head off on a road trip with a wish list of to-dos before they die.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0825232/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jewbearjosh"},"dateCreated":"2008-01-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"heart warming story of friendship-strong male performances","reviewBody":"On new years day, 2008, I saw the film "The Bucket List." It was not my first choice of a film that I wanted to see. To be honest, however, I probably would not have enjoyed any of the films that I would have chosen more. This film is very well done. I liked the screenplay, by Justin Zackham. I liked the direction, by the real talented Rob Reiner. And I was very impressed by the acting. Jack Nicholson and Morgan Freeman did a superb job, playing two dying old guys who befriend each other, and together have the adventure of their lives. The film is very good. The plot involves this hospital owner-Edward Cole-who is dying from cancer, and another cancer victim-Carter Chambers-who meets Cole while getting treatment at the same hospital. After they both find out that they each have only a few months to live, they agree to travel together all over the globe, and follow this list of tasks. They call it the bucket list.

Nicholson gives a real touching performance as Ed Cole. He plays Cole funny, sad, stubborn, angry, strong, fearless, and loud. Morgan gives an equally touching performance as C. Chambers. He plays Chambers smart, cool, romantic, funny, fearless, and emotional. Both men are very moving in this film. They are great sharing the screen. I really enjoyed watching them play scenes together. It was for me a real treat. These guys, Nicholson and Freeman, are two of our finest actors. And this film is no exception.

Even though "The Bucket List" is a small film about friendship, and the meaning of truly living, I do not recommend it for the preteens. There are some very adult scenes. However, families with teenagers will enjoy seeing it together.

Josh Weinman","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":238805,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.4},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Adventure","Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2008-04-02","keywords":"falling asleep,usa,united states,list,journey","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Bucket List","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3367043353","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjMwNDA5MTE2OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDQxNzYzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjMwNDA5MTE2OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDQxNzYzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"The Bucket List - Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000197/","name":"Jack Nicholson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000151/","name":"Morgan Freeman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005003/","name":"Sean Hayes"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001661/","name":"Rob Reiner"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0287540/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0188112/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0951698/","name":"Justin Zackham"}],"duration":"PT1H37M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: New Year's Eve
Happy New Year
programme.desc:
New Year's Eve: Directed by Garry Marshall. With Michelle Pfeiffer, Zac Efron, Charlotte Marshall-Fricker, Fiona Choi. The lives of several couples and singles in New York City intertwine over the course of New Year's Eve." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1598822/","name":"New Year's Eve","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI2Mzg2MDQxOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzc3NTY5Ng@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The lives of several couples and singles in New York City intertwine over the course of New Year's Eve.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1598822/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"JimmyCollins"},"dateCreated":"2011-12-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Too many story lines make New Years Eve a bit of a dud.","reviewBody":"I rather enjoy the odd ensemble comedy such as this film, I somewhat enjoyed Valentines Day and I really enjoyed He's Just Not That Into You, but what those film had but this doesn't is a fewer amount of plot lines. There's just too much going on in this film, far too many characters, as soon as I found myself interested in one plot its segment would end, you can never get really attached to one set of characters.

For me the best storyline was the Michelle Pfieffer and Zefron plot, it was really the only one with a bit of substance, I actually think a full movie of that story would be great, also the Jessica Biel and Seth Meyers plot was rather funny thanks to the highly underrated Ms Biel. This movie is entertaining enough I suppose but it's also lacking any real great laugh out loud moments, the only time I laughed was when Jessica Biel was in labour, she could do some great comedy if given the chance.

Lea Michele manages to bring her great screen charisma to the big screen, she is very fun to watch and her rendition of Aude Lang Syne was lovely and a nice way to end the movie.

If this movie had about four or five less stories happening this movie would have been much better, it's not horrible by any standards but it's not excellent either, also this may sound mean but Sofia Vergara is possibly the most annoying actress alive, at least they didn't put a decent actress in the most annoying role in the film. I mean it's worth paying to see the excellent dance scene between Zefron and Pfieffer over the end credits.

OK, but basically it's exactly the same as Valentines Day but with more actors and a lot less substance.

Enjoy. Maybe.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":83887,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.7},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Romance"],"datePublished":"2011-12-09","keywords":"ensemble film,new year,new year's eve,singer,expecting","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer No. 2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi673095449","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM2NDM0MTc3Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDU1MzU4Ng@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM2NDM0MTc3Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDU1MzU4Ng@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The lives of several couples and singles in New York intertwine over the course of New Year's Eve. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000572/","name":"Sarah Jessica Parker"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004754/","name":"Jessica Biel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005110/","name":"Ashton Kutcher"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005190/","name":"Garry Marshall"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046718/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0176486/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0033868/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0297545/","name":"Katherine Fugate"}],"duration":"PT1H58M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Valentine's Day
Valentinstag
programme.desc:
Valentine's Day: Directed by Garry Marshall. With Jessica Alba, Kathy Bates, Jessica Biel, Bradley Cooper. Intertwining couples and singles in Los Angeles break-up and make-up based on the pressures and expectations of Valentine's Day." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0817230/","name":"Valentine's Day","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTk3MTIwNDIxNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDMyMzcwMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Intertwining couples and singles in Los Angeles break-up and make-up based on the pressures and expectations of Valentine's Day.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0817230/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Mademoiselle_Lemon"},"dateCreated":"2010-11-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Dreadful","reviewBody":"You don't know what awful is until you've seen this film. I wasn't looking for a profound commentary on the human experience - I watched "Valentine's Day" expecting 100 minutes worth of harmless and fun escapism. To say that I was disappointed is a bit of an understatement.

To begin with, the film is WAY too long - or perhaps it just seems like an eternity. Minute after minute, it is sickeningly sappy and sweet, without any depth of character or plot to justify its duration. The acting is for the most part atrocious - or, at best, mediocre. Taylor Swift, in a nightmarish "comic relief" role, and the annoying little boy, in particular, stand out as paragons of annoying incompetence. However, the writing is so awful, even the greatest of thespians could not make this movie bearable. I honestly felt rather embarrassed for the actors, most of whom I'm sure are quite capable if given a half-decent script. Perhaps worst of all, "Valentine's Day" acts like it is an eye-opening and touching study of human relationships, while it's really drivel.

If there's anything I'd like the reader to learn from this review it's to avoid this film at all costs. It isn't good, it isn't even so-bad-it's-good - it's just plain dreadful."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":117245,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.7},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Romance"],"datePublished":"2010-02-10","keywords":"grandmother grandson relationship,grandfather grandson relationship,car,barefoot male,man wrapped in a towel","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Valentine's Day -- International Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2244215833","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA4NTY5NzEyMF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjk3ODYzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA4NTY5NzEyMF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjk3ODYzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Intertwining couples and singles in Los Angeles break-up and make-up based on the pressures and expectations of Valentine's Day."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000210/","name":"Julia Roberts"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004937/","name":"Jamie Foxx"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004266/","name":"Anne Hathaway"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005190/","name":"Garry Marshall"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046718/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0176486/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0033868/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0297545/","name":"Katherine Fugate"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0463359/","name":"Abby Kohn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0799050/","name":"Marc Silverstein"}],"duration":"PT2H5M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Witches of Eastwick
Die Hexen von Eastwick
programme.desc: The Witches of Eastwick: Directed by George Miller. With Jack Nicholson, Cher, Susan Sarandon, Michelle Pfeiffer. Three single women in a picturesque village have their wishes granted, at a cost, when a mysterious and flamboyant man arrives in their lives." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0094332/","name":"The Witches of Eastwick","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTA4ZGRlNDEtNDliMi00NmI0LThlYjctYmViMjI0MDlmOWU2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTA0MjU0Ng@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Three single women in a picturesque village have their wishes granted, at a cost, when a mysterious and flamboyant man arrives in their lives.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0094332/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"smatysia"},"dateCreated":"2000-12-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"What fun Nicholson must have had with this!","reviewBody":"What fun Nicholson must have had with this! He really hams it up here. Very good supporting work by Cher, Susan Sarandon, Michelle Pfieffer, and Veronica Cartwright. The plot is a little bit impenetrable. The "witches" are at first unaware of their power. I suppose I should read Updike's novel, but the one book of his I did read sucked. programme.title: Ballermann 6
Ballermann 6
programme.desc: Ballermann 6: Directed by Gernot Roll, Tom Gerhardt. With Tom Gerhardt, Hilmi Sözer, Christoph M. Ohrt, Diana Frank. Scrambling up their last money, two dudes journey to Mallorca to fullfill their dream and participate in Europe's most famous beach parties." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0118678/","name":"Ballermann 6","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjEzMTUyMDA0MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzI4NjcxMQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Scrambling up their last money, two dudes journey to Mallorca to fullfill their dream and participate in Europe's most famous beach parties.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0118678/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"bscrooked"},"dateCreated":"2021-09-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"I love it","reviewBody":"I first saw this movie when I was like 15, 16 years old, partying on Mallorca/ at the Ballermann was an absolute highlight. I absolutely love the humor in this one, it's so stupid, I'm still dying over it every single time - and watched the movie uncountable times. Both main characters are absolutely hilarious. Over the top, but you can easily like them. I didn't like their two other movies "voll normaaal" and especially "die superbullen" very well, but they definitely nailed it with Ballermann 6. If you can get into the snese of humor, you've at least got to like it. I love it, top 10 of all time in personal ranking.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3138,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.1},"genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"1997-10-16","keywords":"german humor,german abroad,car,automobile,german car","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0314305/","name":"Tom Gerhardt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0845609/","name":"Hilmi Sözer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0290903/","name":"Diana Frank"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005846/","name":"Gernot Roll"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0314305/","name":"Tom Gerhardt"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011349/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0037894/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002257/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0314305/","name":"Tom Gerhardt"}],"duration":"PT1H35M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Shanghai Knights
Shanghai Knights
programme.desc: Shanghai Knights: Directed by David Dobkin. With Jackie Chan, Owen Wilson, Aaron Taylor-Johnson, Tom Fisher. When a Chinese rebel murders Chon's estranged father and escapes to England, Chon and Roy make their way to London with revenge on their minds." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0300471/","name":"Shanghai Knights","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTMxMTgwOTI3Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwMTI2NDQ3._V1_.jpg","description":"When a Chinese rebel murders Chon's estranged father and escapes to England, Chon and Roy make their way to London with revenge on their minds.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0300471/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ornshaw"},"dateCreated":"2003-02-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Expected nothing but LOVED IT!","reviewBody":"I saw this movie only to accompany my children, but I absolutely loved it! Had never seen a Jackie Chan movie, but now I want to see Shanghai Noon too, so we will rent that one. There were several adult references and I don't mean sexually, but funny references only adults would remember. Be sure to stay for the credits as the outtakes are great. programme.title: The Bucket List
Das Beste kommt zum Schluss
programme.desc:
The Bucket List: Directed by Rob Reiner. With Jack Nicholson, Morgan Freeman, Sean Hayes, Beverly Todd. Two terminally ill men escape from a cancer ward and head off on a road trip with a wish list of to-dos before they die." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0825232/","name":"The Bucket List","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY2NTUyMjIyNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwNzYwMDM4._V1_.jpg","description":"Two terminally ill men escape from a cancer ward and head off on a road trip with a wish list of to-dos before they die.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0825232/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jewbearjosh"},"dateCreated":"2008-01-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"heart warming story of friendship-strong male performances","reviewBody":"On new years day, 2008, I saw the film "The Bucket List." It was not my first choice of a film that I wanted to see. To be honest, however, I probably would not have enjoyed any of the films that I would have chosen more. This film is very well done. I liked the screenplay, by Justin Zackham. I liked the direction, by the real talented Rob Reiner. And I was very impressed by the acting. Jack Nicholson and Morgan Freeman did a superb job, playing two dying old guys who befriend each other, and together have the adventure of their lives. The film is very good. The plot involves this hospital owner-Edward Cole-who is dying from cancer, and another cancer victim-Carter Chambers-who meets Cole while getting treatment at the same hospital. After they both find out that they each have only a few months to live, they agree to travel together all over the globe, and follow this list of tasks. They call it the bucket list.

Nicholson gives a real touching performance as Ed Cole. He plays Cole funny, sad, stubborn, angry, strong, fearless, and loud. Morgan gives an equally touching performance as C. Chambers. He plays Chambers smart, cool, romantic, funny, fearless, and emotional. Both men are very moving in this film. They are great sharing the screen. I really enjoyed watching them play scenes together. It was for me a real treat. These guys, Nicholson and Freeman, are two of our finest actors. And this film is no exception.

Even though "The Bucket List" is a small film about friendship, and the meaning of truly living, I do not recommend it for the preteens. There are some very adult scenes. However, families with teenagers will enjoy seeing it together.

Josh Weinman","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":238805,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.4},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Adventure","Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2008-04-02","keywords":"falling asleep,usa,united states,list,journey","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Bucket List","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3367043353","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjMwNDA5MTE2OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDQxNzYzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjMwNDA5MTE2OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDQxNzYzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"The Bucket List - Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000197/","name":"Jack Nicholson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000151/","name":"Morgan Freeman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005003/","name":"Sean Hayes"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001661/","name":"Rob Reiner"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0287540/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0188112/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0951698/","name":"Justin Zackham"}],"duration":"PT1H37M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: New Year's Eve
Happy New Year
programme.desc:
New Year's Eve: Directed by Garry Marshall. With Michelle Pfeiffer, Zac Efron, Charlotte Marshall-Fricker, Fiona Choi. The lives of several couples and singles in New York City intertwine over the course of New Year's Eve." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1598822/","name":"New Year's Eve","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI2Mzg2MDQxOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzc3NTY5Ng@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The lives of several couples and singles in New York City intertwine over the course of New Year's Eve.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1598822/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"JimmyCollins"},"dateCreated":"2011-12-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Too many story lines make New Years Eve a bit of a dud.","reviewBody":"I rather enjoy the odd ensemble comedy such as this film, I somewhat enjoyed Valentines Day and I really enjoyed He's Just Not That Into You, but what those film had but this doesn't is a fewer amount of plot lines. There's just too much going on in this film, far too many characters, as soon as I found myself interested in one plot its segment would end, you can never get really attached to one set of characters.

For me the best storyline was the Michelle Pfieffer and Zefron plot, it was really the only one with a bit of substance, I actually think a full movie of that story would be great, also the Jessica Biel and Seth Meyers plot was rather funny thanks to the highly underrated Ms Biel. This movie is entertaining enough I suppose but it's also lacking any real great laugh out loud moments, the only time I laughed was when Jessica Biel was in labour, she could do some great comedy if given the chance.

Lea Michele manages to bring her great screen charisma to the big screen, she is very fun to watch and her rendition of Aude Lang Syne was lovely and a nice way to end the movie.

If this movie had about four or five less stories happening this movie would have been much better, it's not horrible by any standards but it's not excellent either, also this may sound mean but Sofia Vergara is possibly the most annoying actress alive, at least they didn't put a decent actress in the most annoying role in the film. I mean it's worth paying to see the excellent dance scene between Zefron and Pfieffer over the end credits.

OK, but basically it's exactly the same as Valentines Day but with more actors and a lot less substance.

Enjoy. Maybe.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":83887,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.7},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Romance"],"datePublished":"2011-12-09","keywords":"ensemble film,new year,new year's eve,singer,expecting","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer No. 2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi673095449","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM2NDM0MTc3Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDU1MzU4Ng@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM2NDM0MTc3Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDU1MzU4Ng@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The lives of several couples and singles in New York intertwine over the course of New Year's Eve. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000572/","name":"Sarah Jessica Parker"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004754/","name":"Jessica Biel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005110/","name":"Ashton Kutcher"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005190/","name":"Garry Marshall"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046718/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0176486/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0033868/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0297545/","name":"Katherine Fugate"}],"duration":"PT1H58M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Valentine's Day
Valentinstag
programme.desc:
Valentine's Day: Directed by Garry Marshall. With Jessica Alba, Kathy Bates, Jessica Biel, Bradley Cooper. Intertwining couples and singles in Los Angeles break-up and make-up based on the pressures and expectations of Valentine's Day." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0817230/","name":"Valentine's Day","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTk3MTIwNDIxNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDMyMzcwMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Intertwining couples and singles in Los Angeles break-up and make-up based on the pressures and expectations of Valentine's Day.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0817230/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Mademoiselle_Lemon"},"dateCreated":"2010-11-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Dreadful","reviewBody":"You don't know what awful is until you've seen this film. I wasn't looking for a profound commentary on the human experience - I watched "Valentine's Day" expecting 100 minutes worth of harmless and fun escapism. To say that I was disappointed is a bit of an understatement.

To begin with, the film is WAY too long - or perhaps it just seems like an eternity. Minute after minute, it is sickeningly sappy and sweet, without any depth of character or plot to justify its duration. The acting is for the most part atrocious - or, at best, mediocre. Taylor Swift, in a nightmarish "comic relief" role, and the annoying little boy, in particular, stand out as paragons of annoying incompetence. However, the writing is so awful, even the greatest of thespians could not make this movie bearable. I honestly felt rather embarrassed for the actors, most of whom I'm sure are quite capable if given a half-decent script. Perhaps worst of all, "Valentine's Day" acts like it is an eye-opening and touching study of human relationships, while it's really drivel.

If there's anything I'd like the reader to learn from this review it's to avoid this film at all costs. It isn't good, it isn't even so-bad-it's-good - it's just plain dreadful."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":117245,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.7},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Romance"],"datePublished":"2010-02-10","keywords":"grandmother grandson relationship,grandfather grandson relationship,car,barefoot male,man wrapped in a towel","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Valentine's Day -- International Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2244215833","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA4NTY5NzEyMF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjk3ODYzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA4NTY5NzEyMF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjk3ODYzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Intertwining couples and singles in Los Angeles break-up and make-up based on the pressures and expectations of Valentine's Day."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000210/","name":"Julia Roberts"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004937/","name":"Jamie Foxx"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004266/","name":"Anne Hathaway"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005190/","name":"Garry Marshall"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046718/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0176486/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0033868/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0297545/","name":"Katherine Fugate"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0463359/","name":"Abby Kohn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0799050/","name":"Marc Silverstein"}],"duration":"PT2H5M"}</script><metacontent="

Intertwining couples and singles in Los Angeles break-up and make-up based on the pressures and expectations of Valentine's Day." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0817230/","name":"Valentine's Day","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTk3MTIwNDIxNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDMyMzcwMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Intertwining couples and singles in Los Angeles break-up and make-up based on the pressures and expectations of Valentine's Day.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0817230/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Mademoiselle_Lemon","dateCreated":"2010-11-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Dreadful","reviewBody":"You don't know what awful is until you've seen this film. I wasn't looking for a profound commentary on the human experience - I watched "Valentine's Day" expecting 100 minutes worth of harmless and fun escapism. To say that I was disappointed is a bit of an understatement.

To begin with, the film is WAY too long - or perhaps it just seems like an eternity. Minute after minute, it is sickeningly sappy and sweet, without any depth of character or plot to justify its duration. The acting is for the most part atrocious - or, at best, mediocre. Taylor Swift, in a nightmarish "comic relief" role, and the annoying little boy, in particular, stand out as paragons of annoying incompetence. However, the writing is so awful, even the greatest of thespians could not make this movie bearable. I honestly felt rather embarrassed for the actors, most of whom I'm sure are quite capable if given a half-decent script. Perhaps worst of all, "Valentine's Day" acts like it is an eye-opening and touching study of human relationships, while it's really drivel.

If there's anything I'd like the reader to learn from this review it's to avoid this film at all costs. It isn't good, it isn't even so-bad-it's-good - it's just plain dreadful.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":117245,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.7,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Romance"],"datePublished":"2010-02-10","keywords":"grandmother grandson relationship,grandfather grandson relationship,car,barefoot male,man wrapped in a towel","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Valentine's Day -- International Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2244215833","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA4NTY5NzEyMF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjk3ODYzMzE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA4NTY5NzEyMF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjk3ODYzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Intertwining couples and singles in Los Angeles break-up and make-up based on the pressures and expectations of Valentine's Day.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000210/","name":"Julia Roberts","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004937/","name":"Jamie Foxx","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004266/","name":"Anne Hathaway"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005190/","name":"Garry Marshall"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046718/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0176486/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0033868/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0297545/","name":"Katherine Fugate","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0463359/","name":"Abby Kohn","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0799050/","name":"Marc Silverstein"],"duration":"PT2H5M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Cheaper by the Dozen
Im Dutzend billiger
programme.desc: Cheaper by the Dozen: Directed by Shawn Levy. With Steve Martin, Bonnie Hunt, Piper Perabo, Tom Welling. With his wife doing a book tour, a father of twelve must handle a new job and his unstable brood." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0349205/","name":"Cheaper by the Dozen","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg0NzYxMjY0Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTU0NDczMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"With his wife doing a book tour, a father of twelve must handle a new job and his unstable brood.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0349205/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"PWNYCNY"},"dateCreated":"2010-07-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"Zzzzzzzzzz.","reviewBody":"When watching this movie one is reminded of the word insipid. This movie is appropriate for pre-school age children who have absolutely nothing else to do and would prefer watching images of kids and parents acting silly. Yes, silly is another word that applies to this movie. It is light fare, so light that it floats like a feather, going from one silly scene to another. Oh, another word to describe this movie is cute. Cute is nice but is it entertaining? Is it dramatic? Is it funny? The answer to all three questions is an emphatic no. A movie that cannot be taken seriously is either campy or a comedy and while this movie is not campy it isn't particularly funny either. Other words to describe this movie are schmaltzy, hokey and corny. This movie has the dramatic power of a fair weather cloud. Even Steve Martin cannot rescue this movie from the clutches of banality which can bring even the resolute movie watcher to the brink of boredom and even beyond, to the world of sleep. Zzzzzzzzz.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":98696,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Comedy","Family"],"datePublished":"2004-03-17","keywords":"child vomiting,child answering the telephone,flip phone,telephone call,frog in pocket","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Cheaper by the Dozen","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi29229337","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTRlNzhmNjktMmVmMi00YTI3LWI2ZDEtNDM0ZDA0MTg0NDczXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTRlNzhmNjktMmVmMi00YTI3LWI2ZDEtNDM0ZDA0MTg0NDczXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000188/","name":"Steve Martin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001372/","name":"Bonnie Hunt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0240381/","name":"Hilary Duff"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0506613/","name":"Shawn Levy"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0033486/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0318326/","name":"Frank B. programme.title: An American Pickle
An American Pickle
programme.desc: An American Pickle: Directed by Brandon Trost. With Seth Rogen, Sarah Snook, Molly Evensen, Eliot Glazer. An immigrant worker at a pickle factory is accidentally preserved for 100 years and wakes up in modern-day Brooklyn." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9059704/","name":"An American Pickle","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmRkZmZiNzUtMzgwYy00NTEzLWE2NjctMmI3NGI5ZTBiNDdkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzE3ODQxNjU@._V1_.jpg","description":"An immigrant worker at a pickle factory is accidentally preserved for 100 years and wakes up in modern-day Brooklyn.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9059704/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"G00fhunter"},"dateCreated":"2020-08-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Something to watch","reviewBody":"This movie was not bad but not good either.It kept my attention but wasn't anything spectacular or anything I'll even remember watching for that matter.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":20691,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.7},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"2020-08-06","keywords":"time travel,time traveler,immigrant,jewish,brooklyn","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3105799705","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODU3MWM3MmYtYTdiNi00YmI4LWI2MTMtMjYzNzM4OTE1NzdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODU3MWM3MmYtYTdiNi00YmI4LWI2MTMtMjYzNzM4OTE1NzdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"AN AMERICAN PICKLE, directed by Brandon Trost, is based on Simon Rich's New Yorker novella and stars Seth Rogen as Herschel Greenbaum, a struggling laborer who immigrates to America in 1920 with dreams of building a better life for his beloved family. One day, while working at his factory job, he falls into a vat of pickles and is brined for 100 years. The brine preserves him perfectly and when he emerges in present-day Brooklyn, he finds that he hasn't aged a day. But when he seeks out his family, he is troubled to learn that his only surviving relative is his great-grandson, Ben Greenbaum (also played by Rogen), a mild-mannered computer coder whom Herschel can't even begin to understand."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0736622/","name":"Seth Rogen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3512758/","name":"Sarah Snook"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6127780/","name":"Molly Evensen"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1060930/","name":"Brandon Trost"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0345956/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0719807/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0026545/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2919995/","name":"Simon Rich"}],"duration":"PT1H28M"}</script><metacontent="

An immigrant worker at a pickle factory is accidentally preserved for 100 years and wakes up in modern-day Brooklyn." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9059704/","name":"An American Pickle","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmRkZmZiNzUtMzgwYy00NTEzLWE2NjctMmI3NGI5ZTBiNDdkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzE3ODQxNjU@._V1_.jpg","description":"An immigrant worker at a pickle factory is accidentally preserved for 100 years and wakes up in modern-day Brooklyn.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9059704/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"G00fhunter","dateCreated":"2020-08-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Something to watch","reviewBody":"This movie was not bad but not good either.It kept my attention but wasn't anything spectacular or anything I'll even remember watching for that matter.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":20691,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.7,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"2020-08-06","keywords":"time travel,time traveler,immigrant,jewish,brooklyn","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3105799705","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODU3MWM3MmYtYTdiNi00YmI4LWI2MTMtMjYzNzM4OTE1NzdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODU3MWM3MmYtYTdiNi00YmI4LWI2MTMtMjYzNzM4OTE1NzdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"AN AMERICAN PICKLE, directed by Brandon Trost, is based on Simon Rich's New Yorker novella and stars Seth Rogen as Herschel Greenbaum, a struggling laborer who immigrates to America in 1920 with dreams of building a better life for his beloved family. One day, while working at his factory job, he falls into a vat of pickles and is brined for 100 years. The brine preserves him perfectly and when he emerges in present-day Brooklyn, he finds that he hasn't aged a day. But when he seeks out his family, he is troubled to learn that his only surviving relative is his great-grandson, Ben Greenbaum (also played by Rogen), a mild-mannered computer coder whom Herschel can't even begin to understand.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0736622/","name":"Seth Rogen","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3512758/","name":"Sarah Snook","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6127780/","name":"Molly Evensen"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1060930/","name":"Brandon Trost"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0345956/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0719807/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0026545/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2919995/","name":"Simon Rich"],"duration":"PT1H28M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Hangover
Hangover
programme.desc: The Hangover: Directed by Todd Phillips. With Bradley Cooper, Ed Helms, Zach Galifianakis, Justin Bartha. Three buddies wake up from a bachelor party in Las Vegas, with no memory of the previous night and the bachelor missing. They make their way around the city in order to find their friend before his wedding." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1119646/","name":"The Hangover","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGQwZjg5YmYtY2VkNC00NzliLTljYTctNzI5NmU3MjE2ODQzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzkwMjQ5NzM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Three buddies wake up from a bachelor party in Las Vegas, with no memory of the previous night and the bachelor missing. They make their way around the city in order to find their friend before his wedding.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1119646/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"agmancuso"},"dateCreated":"2009-06-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Heterosexuals in Sin City","reviewBody":"Yes, okay, it's very funny at times down right hilarious. What sets this comedy apart from others of its ilk, is a well structured script and a pace that doesn't allow any form of thinking. The chemistry between the four leads is also a plus. There is a surprising, maybe unconscious, touch of innocence in the midst of this night of debauchery that makes it palatable even charming. Bradley Cooper is coming into his own and I'm absolutely certain that he was born to play Emperor Caligula in a future Ridley Scott flick. The women, as in most films about a bunch of heterosexuals doing childish things, are treated appallingly. They are the enemy that they have to protect themselves from or just escape, run, run as fast and as far as you can. Try to find the hooker with a heart of gold, and if she looks like Heathter Graham, that much better and forget about settling down. "The Hangover" has already become the surprise hit of the summer 2009. I say, well done, it could have been worse","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":749303,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"2009-07-29","keywords":"hangover,female nudity,bachelor party,implied cunnilingus,fellatio","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Hangover","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2650997529","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQzNjI1ODAwMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjMzNDMyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQzNjI1ODAwMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjMzNDMyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"In Las Vegas, three groomsmen lose their about-to-be-wed buddy during their drunken misadventures, forcing them to retrace their steps in order to find him before the church bells ring."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0302108/","name":"Zach Galifianakis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0177896/","name":"Bradley Cooper"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0058581/","name":"Justin Bartha"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0680846/","name":"Todd Phillips"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0159111/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0221959/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0524190/","name":"Jon Lucas"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0601859/","name":"Scott Moore"}],"duration":"PT1H40M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Step Up 2: The Streets: Directed by Jon M. Chu. With Briana Evigan, Robert Hoffman, Adam Sevani, Cassie Ventura. Romantic sparks occur between two dance students from different backgrounds at the Maryland School of the Arts." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1023481/","name":"Step Up 2: The Streets","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc0NzYxOTgxOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTgxMjc1MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Romantic sparks occur between two dance students from different backgrounds at the Maryland School of the Arts.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1023481/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"GibMart7"},"dateCreated":"2008-02-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Dancing Makes The Movie","reviewBody":"I actually thought that the movie was pretty good. It's not as bad as the reviews that it's getting, just don't go in expecting to get an Oscar performance. The storyline was a little all over the place. Typical teen dance movie. BUT the dancing is amazing couldn't keep my eyes off the screen. Robert Hoffman did a decent job, he really lays the charm in throughout the whole movie. The dance scenes make the entire movie. Ethnically, it is such a diverse cast of people, there is someone for everyone to identify with. The soundtrack is insanely good also. By the end of it you will be quoting lines and wanting to dance for sure.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":85707,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Music","Romance"],"datePublished":"2008-06-04","keywords":"dance off,dancing in the rain,dance movie,dance audition,dance crew","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Step Up 2 the Streets","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1253179673","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg3MTAyOTYzM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDMzNjAyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg3MTAyOTYzM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDMzNjAyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Step Up 2 the Streets Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1382207/","name":"Robert Hoffman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0263759/","name":"Briana Evigan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0144260/","name":"Cassie Ventura"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0160840/","name":"Jon M. programme.title: Ghostbusters II
Ghostbusters 2
programme.desc: Ghostbusters II: Directed by Ivan Reitman. With Bill Murray, Dan Aykroyd, Sigourney Weaver, Harold Ramis. The discovery of a massive river of ectoplasm and a resurgence of spectral activity allows the staff of Ghostbusters to revive the business." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0097428/","name":"Ghostbusters II","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2NTk4MjE5Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODIwNjYxMTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"The discovery of a massive river of ectoplasm and a resurgence of spectral activity allows the staff of Ghostbusters to revive the business.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0097428/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"utgard14"},"dateCreated":"2014-08-30","inLanguage":"English","name":""We're here tonight because a psychomagnotheric slime flow of immense proportions is building up beneath the city."","reviewBody":"Tedious retread sequel never reaches the heights of the first Ghosbusters. It just feels like the guys got back together to goof off and get paid for it. Bill Murray seems alternately amused and bored throughout the film. The rest go through the motions. As for new faces, Peter MacNicol is extremely annoying, basically playing the role Rick Moranis played last time. Moranis actually reprises his role but has nothing to do and is shoehorned into things with irritating results. It's not a bad movie. It's enjoyable enough due to the likability of their stars but the story is weak and there's nothing memorable about the whole thing.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":194250,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Action","Comedy","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"1989-06-16","keywords":"ghost,new york city,ghostbuster,baby,slime","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Ghostbusters II","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2401943065","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWUxOTJiOWEtZDY3Yi00MTMzLTk2NWItOWUxNGU4MzJmNWQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWUxOTJiOWEtZDY3Yi00MTMzLTk2NWItOWUxNGU4MzJmNWQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer 2"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000195/","name":"Bill Murray"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000101/","name":"Dan Aykroyd"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000244/","name":"Sigourney Weaver"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0718645/","name":"Ivan Reitman"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000101/","name":"Dan Aykroyd"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000601/","name":"Harold Ramis"}],"duration":"PT1H48M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Ghostbusters
Ghostbusters – Die Geisterjäger
programme.desc:
Ghostbusters: Directed by Ivan Reitman. With Bill Murray, Dan Aykroyd, Sigourney Weaver, Harold Ramis. Three parapsychologists forced out of their university funding set up shop as a unique ghost removal service in New York City, attracting frightened yet skeptical customers." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0087332/","name":"Ghostbusters","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkxMjYyNzgwMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTE3MjYyMTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Three parapsychologists forced out of their university funding set up shop as a unique ghost removal service in New York City, attracting frightened yet skeptical customers.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0087332/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"degeneraatti"},"dateCreated":"2014-09-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"A film that doesn't miss a step","reviewBody":"Laughing at someone is an easy way to make comedy. It's the way school bullies operate. Laughing at an unwilling comedy vehicle also gives to ones doing the laughing a sense of superiority, tickling the satisfaction centers in our brain.

This is not the way Ghost Busters work. They had every possibility to ridicule various groups of humans, but luckily decided not to. The humor here is benign, well written, and constant. The humanity of all characters present is both endearing and an endless supply of laughter.

But what makes Ghost Busters a classic is the fact it doesn't stop here. The story is exciting, with a real sense of adventure. Still, not missing a beat, it never goes overboard, helping audience to laugh whenever laughs are provided.

This movie is comedy gold, and a must for everyone with even a mild love for movies and entertainment. Best watched with a pack of marshmallows.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":383552,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Action","Comedy","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"1984-06-08","keywords":"ghost,ghostbuster,scientist,paranormal investigation team,supernatural being","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"30th Anniversary Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2800593945","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTgxNTM3MDUxNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDgwMDgxMjE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTgxNTM3MDUxNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDgwMDgxMjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch the 30th Anniversary Trailer for Ghostbusters."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000195/","name":"Bill Murray"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000101/","name":"Dan Aykroyd"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000244/","name":"Sigourney Weaver"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0718645/","name":"Ivan Reitman"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0147858/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0012330/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000101/","name":"Dan Aykroyd"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000601/","name":"Harold Ramis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001548/","name":"Rick Moranis"}],"duration":"PT1H45M"}</script><metacontent="

This movie is comedy gold, and a must for everyone with even a mild love for movies and entertainment. programme.title: Ghostbusters II
Ghostbusters 2
programme.desc: Ghostbusters II: Directed by Ivan Reitman. With Bill Murray, Dan Aykroyd, Sigourney Weaver, Harold Ramis. The discovery of a massive river of ectoplasm and a resurgence of spectral activity allows the staff of Ghostbusters to revive the business." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0097428/","name":"Ghostbusters II","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2NTk4MjE5Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODIwNjYxMTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"The discovery of a massive river of ectoplasm and a resurgence of spectral activity allows the staff of Ghostbusters to revive the business.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0097428/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"utgard14"},"dateCreated":"2014-08-30","inLanguage":"English","name":""We're here tonight because a psychomagnotheric slime flow of immense proportions is building up beneath the city."","reviewBody":"Tedious retread sequel never reaches the heights of the first Ghosbusters. It just feels like the guys got back together to goof off and get paid for it. Bill Murray seems alternately amused and bored throughout the film. The rest go through the motions. As for new faces, Peter MacNicol is extremely annoying, basically playing the role Rick Moranis played last time. Moranis actually reprises his role but has nothing to do and is shoehorned into things with irritating results. It's not a bad movie. It's enjoyable enough due to the likability of their stars but the story is weak and there's nothing memorable about the whole thing.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":194250,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Action","Comedy","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"1989-06-16","keywords":"ghost,new york city,ghostbuster,baby,slime","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Ghostbusters II","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2401943065","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWUxOTJiOWEtZDY3Yi00MTMzLTk2NWItOWUxNGU4MzJmNWQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWUxOTJiOWEtZDY3Yi00MTMzLTk2NWItOWUxNGU4MzJmNWQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer 2"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000195/","name":"Bill Murray"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000101/","name":"Dan Aykroyd"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000244/","name":"Sigourney Weaver"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0718645/","name":"Ivan Reitman"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000101/","name":"Dan Aykroyd"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000601/","name":"Harold Ramis"}],"duration":"PT1H48M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Ghostbusters II
Ghostbusters 2
programme.desc: Ghostbusters II: Directed by Ivan Reitman. With Bill Murray, Dan Aykroyd, Sigourney Weaver, Harold Ramis. The discovery of a massive river of ectoplasm and a resurgence of spectral activity allows the staff of Ghostbusters to revive the business." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0097428/","name":"Ghostbusters II","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2NTk4MjE5Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODIwNjYxMTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"The discovery of a massive river of ectoplasm and a resurgence of spectral activity allows the staff of Ghostbusters to revive the business.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0097428/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"utgard14"},"dateCreated":"2014-08-30","inLanguage":"English","name":""We're here tonight because a psychomagnotheric slime flow of immense proportions is building up beneath the city."","reviewBody":"Tedious retread sequel never reaches the heights of the first Ghosbusters. It just feels like the guys got back together to goof off and get paid for it. Bill Murray seems alternately amused and bored throughout the film. The rest go through the motions. As for new faces, Peter MacNicol is extremely annoying, basically playing the role Rick Moranis played last time. Moranis actually reprises his role but has nothing to do and is shoehorned into things with irritating results. It's not a bad movie. It's enjoyable enough due to the likability of their stars but the story is weak and there's nothing memorable about the whole thing.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":194250,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Action","Comedy","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"1989-06-16","keywords":"ghost,new york city,ghostbuster,baby,slime","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Ghostbusters II","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2401943065","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWUxOTJiOWEtZDY3Yi00MTMzLTk2NWItOWUxNGU4MzJmNWQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWUxOTJiOWEtZDY3Yi00MTMzLTk2NWItOWUxNGU4MzJmNWQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer 2"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000195/","name":"Bill Murray"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000101/","name":"Dan Aykroyd"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000244/","name":"Sigourney Weaver"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0718645/","name":"Ivan Reitman"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000101/","name":"Dan Aykroyd"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000601/","name":"Harold Ramis"}],"duration":"PT1H48M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0087332, Title: Ghostbusters, --- Description: Ghostbusters: Directed by Ivan Reitman. With Bill Murray, Dan Aykroyd, Sigourney Weaver, Harold Ramis. Three parapsychologists forced out of their university funding set up shop as a unique ghost removal service in New York City, attracting frightened yet skeptical customers." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0087332/","name":"Ghostbusters","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkxMjYyNzgwMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTE3MjYyMTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Three parapsychologists forced out of their university funding set up shop as a unique ghost removal service in New York City, attracting frightened yet skeptical customers.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0087332/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"degeneraatti","dateCreated":"2014-09-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"A film that doesn't miss a step","reviewBody":"Laughing at someone is an easy way to make comedy. It's the way school bullies operate. Laughing at an unwilling comedy vehicle also gives to ones doing the laughing a sense of superiority, tickling the satisfaction centers in our brain.

This is not the way Ghost Busters work. They had every possibility to ridicule various groups of humans, but luckily decided not to. The humor here is benign, well written, and constant. The humanity of all characters present is both endearing and an endless supply of laughter.

But what makes Ghost Busters a classic is the fact it doesn't stop here. The story is exciting, with a real sense of adventure. Still, not missing a beat, it never goes overboard, helping audience to laugh whenever laughs are provided.

This movie is comedy gold, and a must for everyone with even a mild love for movies and entertainment. Best watched with a pack of marshmallows.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":383552,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8,"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Action","Comedy","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"1984-06-08","keywords":"ghost,ghostbuster,scientist,paranormal investigation team,supernatural being","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"30th Anniversary Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2800593945","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTgxNTM3MDUxNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDgwMDgxMjE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTgxNTM3MDUxNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDgwMDgxMjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch the 30th Anniversary Trailer for Ghostbusters.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000195/","name":"Bill Murray","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000101/","name":"Dan Aykroyd","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000244/","name":"Sigourney Weaver"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0718645/","name":"Ivan Reitman"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0147858/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0012330/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000101/","name":"Dan Aykroyd","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000601/","name":"Harold Ramis","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001548/","name":"Rick Moranis"],"duration":"PT1H45M"</script><metacontent="

Three parapsychologists forced out of their university funding set up shop as a unique ghost removal service in New York City, attracting frightened yet skeptical customers." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0087332/","name":"Ghostbusters","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkxMjYyNzgwMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTE3MjYyMTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Three parapsychologists forced out of their university funding set up shop as a unique ghost removal service in New York City, attracting frightened yet skeptical customers.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0087332/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"degeneraatti"},"dateCreated":"2014-09-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"A film that doesn't miss a step","reviewBody":"Laughing at someone is an easy way to make comedy. It's the way school bullies operate. Laughing at an unwilling comedy vehicle also gives to ones doing the laughing a sense of superiority, tickling the satisfaction centers in our brain.

This is not the way Ghost Busters work. They had every possibility to ridicule various groups of humans, but luckily decided not to. The humor here is benign, well written, and constant. The humanity of all characters present is both endearing and an endless supply of laughter.

But what makes Ghost Busters a classic is the fact it doesn't stop here. The story is exciting, with a real sense of adventure. Still, not missing a beat, it never goes overboard, helping audience to laugh whenever laughs are provided.

This movie is comedy gold, and a must for everyone with even a mild love for movies and entertainment. programme.title: Ghostbusters II
Ghostbusters 2
programme.desc: Ghostbusters II: Directed by Ivan Reitman. With Bill Murray, Dan Aykroyd, Sigourney Weaver, Harold Ramis. The discovery of a massive river of ectoplasm and a resurgence of spectral activity allows the staff of Ghostbusters to revive the business." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0097428/","name":"Ghostbusters II","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2NTk4MjE5Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODIwNjYxMTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"The discovery of a massive river of ectoplasm and a resurgence of spectral activity allows the staff of Ghostbusters to revive the business.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0097428/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"utgard14"},"dateCreated":"2014-08-30","inLanguage":"English","name":""We're here tonight because a psychomagnotheric slime flow of immense proportions is building up beneath the city."","reviewBody":"Tedious retread sequel never reaches the heights of the first Ghosbusters. It just feels like the guys got back together to goof off and get paid for it. Bill Murray seems alternately amused and bored throughout the film. The rest go through the motions. As for new faces, Peter MacNicol is extremely annoying, basically playing the role Rick Moranis played last time. Moranis actually reprises his role but has nothing to do and is shoehorned into things with irritating results. It's not a bad movie. It's enjoyable enough due to the likability of their stars but the story is weak and there's nothing memorable about the whole thing.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":194250,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Action","Comedy","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"1989-06-16","keywords":"ghost,new york city,ghostbuster,baby,slime","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Ghostbusters II","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2401943065","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWUxOTJiOWEtZDY3Yi00MTMzLTk2NWItOWUxNGU4MzJmNWQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWUxOTJiOWEtZDY3Yi00MTMzLTk2NWItOWUxNGU4MzJmNWQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer 2"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000195/","name":"Bill Murray"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000101/","name":"Dan Aykroyd"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000244/","name":"Sigourney Weaver"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0718645/","name":"Ivan Reitman"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000101/","name":"Dan Aykroyd"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000601/","name":"Harold Ramis"}],"duration":"PT1H48M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0087332, Title: Ghostbusters, --- Description: Ghostbusters: Directed by Ivan Reitman. With Bill Murray, Dan Aykroyd, Sigourney Weaver, Harold Ramis. Three parapsychologists forced out of their university funding set up shop as a unique ghost removal service in New York City, attracting frightened yet skeptical customers." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0087332/","name":"Ghostbusters","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkxMjYyNzgwMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTE3MjYyMTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Three parapsychologists forced out of their university funding set up shop as a unique ghost removal service in New York City, attracting frightened yet skeptical customers.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0087332/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"degeneraatti","dateCreated":"2014-09-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"A film that doesn't miss a step","reviewBody":"Laughing at someone is an easy way to make comedy. It's the way school bullies operate. Laughing at an unwilling comedy vehicle also gives to ones doing the laughing a sense of superiority, tickling the satisfaction centers in our brain.

This is not the way Ghost Busters work. They had every possibility to ridicule various groups of humans, but luckily decided not to. The humor here is benign, well written, and constant. The humanity of all characters present is both endearing and an endless supply of laughter.

But what makes Ghost Busters a classic is the fact it doesn't stop here. The story is exciting, with a real sense of adventure. Still, not missing a beat, it never goes overboard, helping audience to laugh whenever laughs are provided.

This movie is comedy gold, and a must for everyone with even a mild love for movies and entertainment. programme.title: Ghostbusters
Ghostbusters – Die Geisterjäger
programme.desc:
Ghostbusters: Directed by Ivan Reitman. With Bill Murray, Dan Aykroyd, Sigourney Weaver, Harold Ramis. Three parapsychologists forced out of their university funding set up shop as a unique ghost removal service in New York City, attracting frightened yet skeptical customers." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0087332/","name":"Ghostbusters","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkxMjYyNzgwMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTE3MjYyMTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Three parapsychologists forced out of their university funding set up shop as a unique ghost removal service in New York City, attracting frightened yet skeptical customers.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0087332/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"degeneraatti"},"dateCreated":"2014-09-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"A film that doesn't miss a step","reviewBody":"Laughing at someone is an easy way to make comedy. It's the way school bullies operate. Laughing at an unwilling comedy vehicle also gives to ones doing the laughing a sense of superiority, tickling the satisfaction centers in our brain.

This is not the way Ghost Busters work. They had every possibility to ridicule various groups of humans, but luckily decided not to. The humor here is benign, well written, and constant. The humanity of all characters present is both endearing and an endless supply of laughter.

But what makes Ghost Busters a classic is the fact it doesn't stop here. The story is exciting, with a real sense of adventure. Still, not missing a beat, it never goes overboard, helping audience to laugh whenever laughs are provided.

This movie is comedy gold, and a must for everyone with even a mild love for movies and entertainment. Best watched with a pack of marshmallows.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":383552,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Action","Comedy","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"1984-06-08","keywords":"ghost,ghostbuster,scientist,paranormal investigation team,supernatural being","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"30th Anniversary Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2800593945","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTgxNTM3MDUxNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDgwMDgxMjE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTgxNTM3MDUxNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDgwMDgxMjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch the 30th Anniversary Trailer for Ghostbusters."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000195/","name":"Bill Murray"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000101/","name":"Dan Aykroyd"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000244/","name":"Sigourney Weaver"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0718645/","name":"Ivan Reitman"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0147858/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0012330/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000101/","name":"Dan Aykroyd"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000601/","name":"Harold Ramis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001548/","name":"Rick Moranis"}],"duration":"PT1H45M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Ghostbusters II
Ghostbusters 2
programme.desc: Ghostbusters II: Directed by Ivan Reitman. With Bill Murray, Dan Aykroyd, Sigourney Weaver, Harold Ramis. The discovery of a massive river of ectoplasm and a resurgence of spectral activity allows the staff of Ghostbusters to revive the business." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0097428/","name":"Ghostbusters II","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2NTk4MjE5Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODIwNjYxMTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"The discovery of a massive river of ectoplasm and a resurgence of spectral activity allows the staff of Ghostbusters to revive the business.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0097428/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"utgard14"},"dateCreated":"2014-08-30","inLanguage":"English","name":""We're here tonight because a psychomagnotheric slime flow of immense proportions is building up beneath the city."","reviewBody":"Tedious retread sequel never reaches the heights of the first Ghosbusters. It just feels like the guys got back together to goof off and get paid for it. Bill Murray seems alternately amused and bored throughout the film. The rest go through the motions. As for new faces, Peter MacNicol is extremely annoying, basically playing the role Rick Moranis played last time. Moranis actually reprises his role but has nothing to do and is shoehorned into things with irritating results. It's not a bad movie. It's enjoyable enough due to the likability of their stars but the story is weak and there's nothing memorable about the whole thing.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":194250,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Action","Comedy","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"1989-06-16","keywords":"ghost,new york city,ghostbuster,baby,slime","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Ghostbusters II","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2401943065","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWUxOTJiOWEtZDY3Yi00MTMzLTk2NWItOWUxNGU4MzJmNWQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWUxOTJiOWEtZDY3Yi00MTMzLTk2NWItOWUxNGU4MzJmNWQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer 2"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000195/","name":"Bill Murray"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000101/","name":"Dan Aykroyd"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000244/","name":"Sigourney Weaver"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0718645/","name":"Ivan Reitman"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000101/","name":"Dan Aykroyd"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000601/","name":"Harold Ramis"}],"duration":"PT1H48M"}</script><metacontent="
